name: AKM
description: AKM high damage assault rifle hai jo 7.62mm ammo use karti hai. Recoil zyada hota hai lekin close aur mid range me bohat powerful hai.

name: M416
description: M416 PUBG ka sab se popular weapon hai. Iski recoil control aur attachments support bohat achi hai.

name: SCAR-L
description: SCAR-L stable aur accurate weapon hai. Medium recoil ke sath mid range fights ke liye best hai.

name: M16A4
description: M16A4 burst fire weapon hai jo long range me bohat effective hoti hai. Auto mode support nahi karti.

name: M24
description: M24 high damage sniper rifle hai. Long range ke liye perfect hai aur ek hi shot me bohat strong impact deta hai. Slow reload aur bolt action hai.
